amendment.description: Amendment sought to add a section to the bill to clarify that the requirements of UMRA, as amended, do not apply if a cost-benefit analysis demonstrates that the benefits of the regulatory action exceed its costs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 113-362 to add Section 14 to the bill to clarify that the requirements of UMRA as amended by this Act do not apply if a cost-benefit analysis demonstrates that the benefits of the regulatory action exceed its costs.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 232 (Roll no. 88).
